mapper.insert: insert into goods(category_num, goods_name, goods_price, goods_quantity, goods_detail) value(#{categoryNum}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsQuantity}, #{goodsDetail} )
mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_num, c.category_name, g.goods_name ,g.goods_price, g.goods_quantity FROM goods g JOIN category c ON g.category_num = c.category_num order by g.goods_num

select g.goods_num, c.category_num, g.goods_name, g.goods_price, g.goods_quantity, g.goods_detail, f.file_path, f.file_system_name from goods g join category c on g.category_num = c.category_num join file f on g.goods_num = f.goods_num where g.goods_num = #{goodsNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE goods set category_num = #{categoryNum}, goods_price=#{goodsPrice}, goods_quantity = #{goodsQuantity}, goods_detail=#{goodsDetail} where goods_num = #{goodsNum}
